Class CacheDataRowAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.cache.persistence.CacheDataRowAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CacheDataRow, CacheSearchRow, Storable

extends Object
implements CacheDataRow

      • initFromLink

        public final void initFromLink(@Nullable
                               CacheGroupContext grp,
                               GridCacheSharedContext<?,?> sharedCtx,
                               PageMemory pageMem,
                               CacheDataRowAdapter.RowData rowData)
                        throws IgniteCheckedException
        Read row from data pages. Can be called with cctx == null, if cache instance is unknown, but its ID is stored in the data row.
        Parameters:
        grp - Cache group.
        sharedCtx - Shared context.
        pageMem - Page memory.
        rowData - Row data.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.
